title: Did anyone figure this out? 820-3330 the common video problem
message:
Here we go again, 820-3330 video distortion. I TRIED everything I could think of.

GPU,VRAM, Caps, MUX,damn none of them work, what else can it be? I m so confused about this board.

Had seen so many and just can't get any of them to work...everything runs normal, no crashed, kernal panics or anything,but sometimes switch to NVIDIA, there is distortions like the ones in the pictures attached.

title: Did anyone figure this out? 820-3330 the common video problem
message: Nope, I have 2 of them here now. So far I can only think of a trace/via issue in the board.

title: Did anyone figure this out? 820-3330 the common video problem
message: Im pretty sure this will be another goldmine if we can figure out, but I really tried so hard on it already, and customers can't afford to replace the whole boards. had like 3-4 boards of this model in shop now
